title: NavMusic - Wear Music Player
summary: An Android Wear music player with built in FTP for easy music transfer.
developerAddress:
PO Box 1080
Teec Nos Pos, AZ
86514
description: NavMusic provides the ability to play offline music on your android wear watch with a clear, simple interface. Go on runs or workout without carrying your phone around. Transfer music quickly and easily over WiFi without the need for a companion app or slow Bluetooth. Features:*Downloads album art and artist images*Dynamic now playing screen*Watch face that features album art from your music*Ad free interfaceNOTE: The mobile app is for Android Wear 1 users. It is only for installation purposes and does not appear in the launcher or add any other features to the app.
descriptionHTML:
NavMusic provides the ability to play offline music on your android wear watch with a clear, simple interface. Go on runs or workout without carrying your phone around. Transfer music quickly and easily over WiFi without the need for a companion app or slow Bluetooth.

Features:
*Downloads album art and artist images
*Dynamic now playing screen
*Watch face that features album art from your music
*Ad free interface

NOTE: The mobile app is for Android Wear 1 users. It is only for installation purposes and does not appear in the launcher or add any other features to the app.
comments: Best app out there for local music from the watch - a pair of Bluetooth plugs and then you have all you need without your phone. Way better than Google music which is a mess when it comes to local music in the watchüëç

A decent standalone music player for android wear with a good control interface . Also support earphone's remote control . However , transflective screen support seems missing , hardly visible under bright sunlight . Would be great for better control interface .
Great way to play offline music. Developer listens for feedback and makes changes!
App said that it's installed, can't find it on my phone. My watch want me to pay for it again when I try to download it.
I installed the app it didn't even show up anywhere. On my phone
Works perfectly, has an FTP server built in that works with more than music. What is there to complain about?
recentChanges: -Fixed downloaded images sometimes loading circular when then shouldn't
